title: Hardware Systems Engineer
summary: We are seeking hard-working individuals who like you to join our team. This is a System Engineering position that entails working with multi-functional groups to continually innovate the iPhone & iPad products. You will have an active engagement with the Hardware, Module and Design & Validation teams in Apple.
description: Evaluate overall system design by crafting and conducting evaluation tests; applying knowledge of engineering fundamentals Support Hardware teams in crafting the next-generation iPhones & iPad; build Failure Analysis reports Be responsible for the optimization of the test processes Make recommendations for coverage improvements Develop benchmarking matrix by crafting or modifying automation scripts for building and assembling performance graphs Work towards closing potential test gaps and build improvements to the scripts Position involves supporting hardware development activities at manufacturing partner facilities
key_qualifications: Hands-on experience in prototype work and functional verification specifically with electronics Proficient with lab equipment: digital multi-meter, spectrum analyzer, signal generator, oscilloscope, power supply, data logger, etc. Prior experience with superb coding/scripting skills (Python, Perl, Shell, Unix) Prior working experience with prototype hardware and/or development boards is helpful Developed automated test and measurement systems - Setup of environments optimized for test measurement Comfortable working in a constantly evolving environment; Confirmed ability to work independently under high pressure and dynamic environment
